languages.text: "Скорблю. Грандиозный человек был, с силой его характера могла сравниться лишь истовость его веры. Именно он когда-то посвятил меня в сан... настоящий, а не пиратский. Он меня многому научил, хоть и не во всем я с ним согласен был. Нескоро в Просторе появится новый слуга Императора, подобный ему".

traits.locale_text: "Скорблю. Грандиозный человек был — с силой его характера могло сравниться лишь то, как истово он верил. Именно он когда-то посвятил меня в учения святого Друза, и с тех пор я не переставал поражаться его искренности и набожности. Не уверен, что Простор Коронус когда-либо увидит слугу Императора подобного ему".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "I do. A grand man he was, with a strength of character that was only rivalled by the fervour of his faith. It was he who ordained me... ordained me properly, not in the pirate fashion. He taught me a lot, even though I didn't always agree with him. It will be a long time before the Expanse sees another servant of the Emperor quite like him."
languages.original_text: "Скорблю. Грандиозный человек был, с силой его характера могла сравниться лишь истовость его веры. Именно он когда-то посвятил меня в сан... настоящий, а не пиратский. Он меня многому научил, хоть и не во всем я с ним согласен был. Нескоро в Просторе появится новый слуга Императора, подобный ему".

traits.locale_text: "I do. A grand man he was, with a strength of character that was only rivalled by the fervour of his faith. It was he who ordained me... proper ordained me, not in the pirate sense. He taught me a lot, even though I didn't always agree with him. It will be a long time before the Expanse sees another servant of the Emperor who is quite like him."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "I do. A grand man he was, with a strength of character that was only rivalled by the fervour of his faith. It was he who ordained me... ordained me properly, not in the pirate fashion. He taught me a lot, even though I didn't always agree with him. It will be a long time before the Expanse sees another servant of the Emperor quite like him."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: “我很难过。他是个伟大的人，他顽强的性格，恐怕只有他狂热的信仰能与之相提并论。当初为我授职的人正是他……是那种正规的授职，不是海盗的那种。尽管我有时并不同意他的观点，但他还是教会了我很多东西。恐怕科罗努斯扩区要等上很多年，才能再次等到像他一样虔诚的忠仆。”
languages.original_text: "I do. A grand man he was, with a strength of character that was only rivalled by the fervour of his faith. It was he who ordained me... ordained me properly, not in the pirate fashion. He taught me a lot, even though I didn't always agree with him. It will be a long time before the Expanse sees another servant of the Emperor quite like him."

traits.locale_text: “我很难过。他是个伟大的人，他顽强的性格恐怕只有他狂热的信仰能与之媲美。当初为我授职的人正是他……是那种正确的授职，不是海盗的那种。尽管我有时候并不同意他的观点，但他还是教会了我很多东西。恐怕科罗努斯扩区要等上很多年，才能再次见到像他一样虔诚的帝皇忠仆。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: 「ああ。信仰の熱意に匹敵するような、偉大な男でした。彼こそが、私を任命した張本人…正しい任命です。海賊の様な方法ではなくて。彼は様々な事を教えてくれました。意見が食い違う事もありましたが。彼のような皇帝のしもべは、中々エクスパンスに現れないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I do. A grand man he was, with a strength of character that was only rivalled by the fervour of his faith. It was he who ordained me... ordained me properly, not in the pirate fashion. He taught me a lot, even though I didn't always agree with him. It will be a long time before the Expanse sees another servant of the Emperor quite like him."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ。信仰の熱意に匹敵するような、偉大な男でした。彼こそが、私を任命した張本人…正しい任命です。海賊の様な方法ではなくて。彼は様々な事を教えてくれました。意見が食い違う事もありましたが。彼のような皇帝のしもべは、中々エクスパンスに現れないでしょう」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: «Sí. Era un gran hombre, con un carácter que solo tenía por rival al fervor de su fe. Fue él quien me... enderezó, no en el sentido pirata. Me enseñó mucho, aunque no siempre estuviera de acuerdo con él. Pasará mucho tiempo antes de que la Extensión dé con otro sirviente del Emperador como él».
languages.original_text: "I do. A grand man he was, with a strength of character that was only rivalled by the fervour of his faith. It was he who ordained me... ordained me properly, not in the pirate fashion. He taught me a lot, even though I didn't always agree with him. It will be a long time before the Expanse sees another servant of the Emperor quite like him."

traits.locale_text: «Sí. Era un gran hombre, con un carácter que solo tenía por rival al fervor de su fe. Fue él quien me... enderezó, no en el sentido pirata. Me enseñó mucho, aunque no siempre estuviera de acuerdo con él. Pasará mucho tiempo antes de que la Extensión dé con otro sirviente del Emperador como él».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Ja. Er war ein großer Mann, mit einer Charakterstärke, die nur noch von der Inbrunst seines Glaubens übertroffen wurde. Er hat mich geweiht ... richtig geweiht, nicht wie bei den Piraten. Er hat mich viel gelehrt, auch wenn ich nicht immer einer Meinung mit ihm war. Die Ausdehnung wird lange keinen Diener des Imperators wie ihn mehr erleben."
languages.original_text: "I do. A grand man he was, with a strength of character that was only rivalled by the fervour of his faith. It was he who ordained me... ordained me properly, not in the pirate fashion. He taught me a lot, even though I didn't always agree with him. It will be a long time before the Expanse sees another servant of the Emperor quite like him."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Er war ein großer Mann, mit einer Charakterstärke, die nur noch von der Inbrunst seines Glaubens übertroffen wurde. Er hat mich geweiht ... richtig geweiht, nicht wie bei den Piraten. Er hat mich viel gelehrt, auch wenn ich nicht immer einer Meinung mit ihm war. Die Ausdehnung wird lange keinen Diener des Imperators wie ihn mehr erleben."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: « Certainement. C'était un grand homme ; sa force de caractère n'avait d'égale que l'ardeur de sa foi. C'est lui qui m'a ordonné... officiellement, j'entends. Et même si nous n'étions pas toujours d'accord, il m'a beaucoup appris. Ce n'est pas demain la veille que les Étendues bénéficieront à nouveau des services d'un fidèle de l'Empereur de sa trempe. »
languages.original_text: "I do. A grand man he was, with a strength of character that was only rivalled by the fervour of his faith. It was he who ordained me... ordained me properly, not in the pirate fashion. He taught me a lot, even though I didn't always agree with him. It will be a long time before the Expanse sees another servant of the Emperor quite like him."

traits.locale_text: « Certainement. C'était un grand homme ; sa force de caractère n'avait d'égale que l'ardeur de sa foi. C'est lui qui m'a ordonné... officiellement, j'entends. Et même si nous n'étions pas toujours d'accord, il m'a beaucoup appris. Ce n'est pas demain la veille que les Étendues pourront bénéficier des services d'un fidèle de l'Empereur de sa trempe. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Öyleyim. Büyük bir adamdı, karakterinin gücüne yalnızca inancının coşkusu rakip olabilirdi. Beni kanatları altına alan oydu ve korsanların aksine bunu düzgün bir şekilde yaptı. Her zaman onunla aynı fikirde olmadıysam da bana birçok şey öğretti. İmparator'un böyle bir hizmetkârının daha Enginlik'te ortaya çıkması kolay olmayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "I do. A grand man he was, with a strength of character that was only rivalled by the fervour of his faith. It was he who ordained me... ordained me properly, not in the pirate fashion. He taught me a lot, even though I didn't always agree with him. It will be a long time before the Expanse sees another servant of the Emperor quite like him."

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyim. Büyük bir adamdı ve karakterinin gücüne yalnızca inancının coşkusu rakip olabilirdi. Beni kanatları altına alan oydu ve bunu düzgün bir şekilde yaptı, korsan yöntemleriyle değil. Her zaman onunla aynı fikirde olmadıysam da bana birçok şey öğretti. Enginlik'in onun gibi bir İmparator hizmetkârına denk gelmesi uzun zaman alacak."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
